"Hit Song Blues" - A song about feeling left out or about writing a hit song.
"The Secret to Success" - A song about the journey to becoming a successful artist and the struggles along the way.
"The Power of Failure" - A song about the importance of failure and how it can lead to success.
"The Art of Collaboration" - A song about the process of collaborating with other artists and how it can lead to greatness.
"The Evolution of Music" - A song about the history of music and how it has evolved over time.
